content: through the back loop by inserting the lh needle into the front = 1 st decrease d sssk | slip 3 stitches as if to knit knit together through the back loop by inserting the lh needle into the front = 2 sts decrease d ssssk | slip 4 stitches as if to knit knit together through the back loop by inserting the lh needle into the front = 3 sts decrease d ws | wrong side yo | yarn over 2/2 lc | slip 2 stitches to cn and hold in front knit 2 knit 2 from cn 3/3 lc | slip 3 stitches to cn and hold in front knit 3 knit 3 from cn 3/3 rc | slip 3 stitches to cn and hold in back knit 3 knit 3 from cn charts the charts are worked in the round read from right to left on every round 3/6 mipi bobbles a video tutorial can be found here bobbles can be made larger or smaller as preffered by knitting through the front and back loops more or less times tip | to make the bobble pop wyif slip bobble to lh needle wrap yarn around bobble counterclockwise pull the yarn tightly and slip bobble back to rh needle chart a chart b #snowseasonstockings 4/6 mipi let s create cuff using 4 5 mm | us 7 needles with a 40 cm | 16 inch cable co 72 sts using the longtail co method join in the round whilst being careful to not twist the sts and place bor m ribbing round 1 *k1 p1* repeat from *-* to bor m work round 1 above a total of 38 times or until the ribbing measures approx 16 cm | 6 25 inch change to 5 mm | us 8 needles now we will start working our cabled motif using chart a and moss stitch using chart b set-up rounds round 1 k1 p1 8 times pm row 1 chart a across 40 sts pm k1 p1 8 times to reach bor m round 2 row 2 chart b to m slip m row 2 chart a to m slip m row 2 chart b to bor m continue in the round round 3 row 3 chart b to m slip m chart a to m slip m row 3 chart b to bor m round 4 row 4 chart b to m slip m chart a to m slip m row 4 chart b to bor m work rounds 3-4 above for a total of 7 repeats of chart a then work 5 more rounds to end with row 5 of chart a the cabled part of the cuff measures approx 21 cm | 8 25 inch short row heel next we will start shaping our heel using german short row each row we are working 2 sts less than the previous row change to a 80 cm | 32 inch cable work as follows row 1 rs
